TopicTitle: Identify the song by some of its lyrics!

Articles.Content:
Here's how it works:

Example:

P1: "Lemme just step right in, I got things to invent!"

P2: ERB Steve Jobs vs Bill Gates!

"Sign up now to the battle for the planetside! This is a theatre of war, not a pantomime!"

P3: Dan Bull's Battle for the Planetside.

And so on...

Rules:

1. Try to keep the songs friendly for all ages, or at least don't quote bad words.

2. No movie quotes, unless it's lyrics from a song in a movie.

3. Try to have fun.

4. Put the quoted lyrics in quotation marks.

Let's start.

"Remember when you tried to kill me twice?"

The Portal 2 end credits song

This is a hard one:

"Never gonna give you up, never gonna let you down..."

> 
> The Portal 2 end credits song
> This is a hard one:
> 
> "Never gonna give you up, never gonna let you down..."

Damnit, I had to google that, I've been rick rolled. Good one. 

Okay, this one's even harder. Good luck..

"Seid Umschlungen, Millionen, Diesen kuÃƒÅ¸ der ganzen welt!"

(And no, I'm not German, just lyrics from a certain choral symphony by a certain composer that died in 1827..)

> 
> Damnit, I had to google that, I've been rick rolled. Good one. 
> Okay, this one's even harder. Good luck..
> 
> "Seid Umschlungen, Millionen, Diesen kuÃƒÅ¸ der ganzen welt!"
> 
> (And no, I'm not German, just lyrics from a certain choral symphony by a certain composer that died in 1827..)

Damn it I had to look it up and that was Beethoven! GG Dude
It's somethin' about you girl, that makes my head wannna twirl

On the floor. I did not enjoy searching those lyrics up. The song those lyrics takes you to is not pretty.

"Then someone yelled out contact, and the bloke behind me swore"

I think it is I was only nineteen or something like that.

(I had to look up)

"You mother get up come on get down with the sickness."

Down with the Sickness?

*"Es braust, unser Panzer, im Sturmwind dahin!*

Panzerleid I had to search it UPPPP!!!!

Im walking in Memphis.

Walking in Memphis, unless that was a trick one:

OK, here's an oldie but goodie:

"Can you tell a green field,

From a cold steel rail,

A smile from a veil???"

Pink floyd: Wish you were here.

This one is translated!

The dreams enbraced by a single life

are boundless beyond even the stars.

The dreams that we foster over time,

are waiting for the moment when we come upon them.

The words we exchange make our hearts tremble,

and a chance meeting could change the future.

- - - Updated - - -

Oh and Overland. PLEASE don't give it away.

Dont you know this house is fallin apart?

The Weakerthans - Bigfoot!

You can feel the light start to tremble  

Washing what you know out to sea  

You can see your life out of the window, tonight...

If I lose myself tonight  

It'll be by your side  

If I lose myself tonight  

Wooh, wooh, wooh!

If I lose myself tonight  

It'll be you and I  

Lose myself tonight!'
